title: A discussion on the insights into life you can discover from your hands.
itunes:title: A discussion on the insights into life you can discover from your hands.
description:
George Noory and palmist Vernon Mahabal explore his work as a palm reader, the psychic forces that can be displayed in the hands and how it can be used to predict the future.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
